refnamediv.refpurpose: Launch a new guest domain, based on an XML description

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
connection
Libvirt connection obtained by calling libvirt_connect.
xml
XML description of the domain. For more details see https:/www.libvirt.org/formatdomain.html

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns &false; on failure and domain resource on success
